snippet: Two close allies of Kosovo's prime minister, Hashim Thaci, split from him on Friday to launch a new party to contest a national election expected to be held between June and September....

headline.print_headline: Kosovo PM's Party Splits Before National Election
headline.main: Kosovo PM's Party Splits Before National Election

lead_paragraph: Two close allies of Kosovo's prime minister, Hashim Thaci, split from him on Friday to launch a new party to contest a national election expected to be held between June and September.
